document_data.name: Sneeze
document_data.refs1e: {{Cite dragon/60/More Cantrips: Mini-spells for apprentice magic-users|18}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sneeze''''' was a person-affecting [[cantrip]] that acolyte [[wizard]]s could learn.{{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|6}} It caused a target creature to experience an irritation of the nasal passages, possibly forcing a spasmodic, violent exhalation.
document_data.Effects: This cantrip was similar to the ''[[scratch]]'' cantrip and had a range of {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}}. It caused one creature to experience a tickling in the nose that prompted a single sneeze to relieve the irritation. If the target managed to resist the spell, nothing happened.
document_data.Components: This cantrip required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast. The caster spoke the name of a breathing irritant (dust, pepper, ''etc.'') and touched their nose.
